alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Morris and Lyon Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Council Grove to 5 miles southeast of Cottonwood Falls. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Council Grove, Americus, Olpe, Neosho Rapids, Allen, Admire, Bushong and Dunlap. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 128 and 141. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 117 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
